page.title: 14 INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: WINTERSLOW ITSELF IS A VERY INTERESTING VILLAGE.{MR PAVEY}WAS BORN IN WINTERSLOW. HE WENT TO WINTERSLOW SCHOOL WHEN HE WAS A CHILD. HE STILL COMES TO WINTERSLOW SCHOOL FOR THE OLD PEOPLES LUNCH WHICH IS HELD EVERY MONTH ON A THURSDAY.{MR MILLS}IS AN ASTRONOMER HE HAS LOTS OF TELESCOPES. HE IS 79 YEARS OLD. HE LIVES IN FIRS ROAD AND HE IS ALSO A MEMBER OF THE ASTRONOMICAL SOCIETY. {REVEREND COHEN}IS THE NEW RECTOR TAKING THE PLACE OF REVEREND WILLIAMS. HE IS MARRIED WITH 4 CHILDREN. IN HIS PAST LIFE HE HAS BEEN A TEACHER AND A BANKER AS WELL AS BEING A CLERGYMAN.{MRS P WOOTTEN}IS THE HEAD TEACHER OF WINTERSLOW SCHOOL. SHE CAME TO THE SCHOOL IN 1981 AND SINCE THEN MANY CHANGES HAVE OCCURRED.
